TopicTitle: Launchpad -- Well, do I feel stupid!

Articles.Content:
Only now after six months I figured out that you can click on the launchpad in the KSP menu, to pick a ship, crew and mission flag, and then launch it.

As opposed to wasting time going to the VAB, click load, and then click launch.
You can also click on the runway and do the same thing! Merry Christmas! (or happy holidays whichever you prefer )

I know it's there, but keep forgetting to use it

Most of my not-first launches have some form of modification to them which requires me to use the VAB anyway, so that might explain it.
The only thing that bugs me is that there is no big red LAUNCH button there. I think it's the only menu in KSP where you have to doubleclick.
